doc:desc.p: Top level initialization in this file instantiates the global "community library" named 'Syntelos'. For example the 'Syntelos.add(name,fconst)' library function. By convention, collection (package or branch) names are in title case, and functions (members or leaves) are lower case.

Each member, branch or leaf, will have properties named 'localName', 'canonicalName', 'collectionName' and 'collectionLeaf'. The local name is the member's name in its immediate parent container member. The canonical name is the member's fully qualified, dot delimited name. And the collection name is the name of the member's immediate parent container. The value of 'collectionLeaf' is a boolean that is false when members have been added to this member.
The library function Syntelos.add(name, object) is used to add new members into this community library collection.
The otherwise undocumented library members Syntelos.SVG.xmlns and Syntelos.XLink.xmlns are constant values for the standard XML Namespace URI strings for the SVG and XLink standards.
